title: Invert Dictionary with Non-Unique Values
description: Dictionaries are a fundamental data structure in Python that allow you to store key-value pairs. Sometimes, you may need to invert a dictionary, which means swapping the keys and values so that the values become the keys and the keys become the values. In this challenge, you will be tasked with writing a function that inverts a dictionary with non-unique hashable values.

meta.title: Python Dictionary Inversion | Data Structure Challenges
meta.description: Learn how to invert a dictionary with non-unique hashable values in Python. Explore a step-by-step solution to this programming challenge.
meta.keywords: Python, Dictionary, Data Structure, Inversion, Hashable Values

i18n.title: 反转具有非唯一值的字典
i18n.description: 字典是Python中的一种基本数据结构，可让你存储键值对。有时，你可能需要反转字典，即交换键和值，使值成为键，键成为值。在这个挑战中，你将负责编写一个函数，用于反转具有非唯一可哈希值的字典。

meta.title: Python字典反转 | 数据结构挑战
meta.description: 学习如何在Python中反转具有非唯一可哈希值的字典。探索此编程挑战的分步解决方案。
meta.keywords: Python, 字典, 数据结构, 反转, 可哈希值
